pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculation of Groundwater Mounding Beneath an Infiltration Basin // Calculation groundwater mounding beneath an infiltration basin based on the Hantush (1967) equation (doi:10.1029/WR003i001p00227). The correct implementation is shown with a verification example based on a USGS report (page 25, https://pubs.usgs.gov/sir/2010/5102/support/sir2010-5102.pd f#page=35).
